_sText:
**de _ nostria _ b1**
==================
<iframe width="440" height="235" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/5C_t7vTQi0E" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
_Available in 720p._

Counter-Terrorists: Prevent Terrorists from bombing chemical weapon crates. Team members must defuse any bombs that threaten targeted areas.

Terrorists: The Terrorist carrying the C4 must destroy one of the chemical weapon stashes.

Background: Terrorists in the middle east are planning on blowing up yet another chemical weapons storage facility that will devastate the local area and its inhabitants due to the fallout of chemicals from the explosion.

**Features**
==================
- HDR (Tonemap Controller used)
- Soundscape (Indoors and Outdoors)
- Optimisation
- 3d skybox
- Overview / Radar
- Detail
- 64 spawn points

Installation
==================
To install, unpack the .rar file to:

"Steam\steamapps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps"

Comment & Rate
==================  
Please give constructive feedback and rate.
This is the beta release. I tried to fix as many bugs as possible. But there might be some spots that I forgot to add a playerclip brush for example. Please tell me so I can fix that for the next release.
I worked on this map with alot of dedication and I hope you guys like it.

Have Fun !
